definition[0]: to leave a bad or difficult situation, instead of trying to make it better
example[0]: When the business started to have problems, it was very tempting to walk away.
example[1]: You canâ€™t just walk away from 15 years of marriage!
definition[1]: to come out of an accident or very bad situation without being harmed
example[2]: Miraculously, both drivers walked away without a scratch.
